revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Iceberg Ruins |image = [[File:Iceberg Ruins.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Iceberg Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = North of Snowslide Slope }} '''Iceberg Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP. == Encount..."
